constituent: ought, shape, head, page, one, ceiling, drop, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight
heisigStory: Shape . . . head. This is the only time that shape is placed to the left of its relative element, the head.
koohiiStory1: Why, I OUGHT to RESHAPE your HEAD...
koohiiStory2: Since this Kanji is exceptional, the shape ought to be on the left side. Got that into your head?
kunYomi: すべから.く、すべし、ひげ、まつ、もち.いる、もと.める
